## Vectors

```{r}
#--- create a vector
dogs <- c("teddy", "khora", "waffle", "banjo", "tallie")

#---check the class 
class(dogs)
```

```{r}
cats <- c("creamsicle wolf", 14.2, 3L)
#---character is the most flexible data type so if we check the class it will act as a character 
class(cats)
```
